import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Col'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Row'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Card'; import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/esm/ListGroup'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet-async'; import CheckoutSteps from '../Components/CheckoutSteps'; import { Store } from '../Store'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Button'; export default function PlaceOrderScreen() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { state, dispatch: ctxDispatch } = useContext(Store); const { cart, userInfo } = state; const placeOrderHandler = () => {}; useEffect(() => { if (!cart.paymentMethod) { navigate('/payment'); } }); return (
Preview Order

Place Order

Shipping Name : {cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
Address : {cart.shippingAddress.address},{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country} Edit Payment Method : {cart.paymentMethod} Edit Items {cart.cartItems.map((item) => ( {' '} {item.name} {item.quantity} RM {item.price} ))} Order Summary Items RM {cart.itemsPrice.toFixed(2)} Shipping RM {cart.shippingPrice.toFixed(2)} GST Tax (6%) RM {cart.taxPrice.toFixed(2)} Order Total RM {cart.totalPrice.toFixed(2)}
); }
